trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the maximum length of array or string data allowed in a property.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The maximum allowable length of array or string data.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the maximum allowable length of the array or string data.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The maximum allowable length of the array or string data.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Applies formatting to a specified error message.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name to include in the formatted string.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A localized string to describe the maximum acceptable length.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Determines whether a specified object is valid.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the value is null, or if the value is less than or equal to the specified maximum length; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx$ xx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Length is zero or less than negative one.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xx xxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x
